definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="eX">eX</variable><variable type="Number" id="eY">eY</variable><variable type="Number" id="eZ">eZ</variable><variable type="Number" id="nOffset">nOffset</variable><variable type="Number" id="nEntityCount">nEntityCount</variable><variable type="Number" id="nSize">nSize</variable><variable type="Boolean" id="bBreak">bBreak</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="1224" y="83"><field name="trigger">block_break</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">6</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation
